content.question: What is the rate of change, in square inches per second, of the area of the region at the instant when <math alttext="uppercase R" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> is <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> inches and <math alttext="lowercase r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> inches?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
